org.pac4j.core.context
Class J2EContext

java.lang.Object
  org.pac4j.core.context.J2EContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
WebContext
public class J2EContext
extends Object
implements WebContext

This implementation uses the J2E request and session.

Since:
1.4.0
Author:
Jerome Leleu
